title: Autopsy Simulator
description: In Autopsy Simulator: Dead Memories, you play a middle-aged pathologist whose life has taken a turn for the worse. After a career downfall and the loss of your beloved wife, you live each day shattered and exhausted . One day during a routine post- mortem , you find a relic of your past hidden inside a body. Now, it feels like something just wonâ€™t let go Mirror of Heaven

system_requirements.Processor: Intel core i7-860 or AMD Phenom II X4 955
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 470, 4 GB
